params.ethValueSent: The amount of ETH sent with the transaction
params.minterArguments: The arguments passed to the minter, which should be the address to mint to
params.quantity: The quantity of tokens to mint

contractName().notice: The name of the sale strategy

contractURI().notice: Contract URI returns the uri for more information about the given contract

contractVersion().notice: The version of the sale strategy

createToken(address,(uint256,uint64,uint.notice: Sets the sale config for the next token

requestMint(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Compiles and returns the commands needed to mint a token using this sales strategy

resetSale(uint256).notice: Deletes the sale config for a given token

sale(address,uint256).notice: Returns the sale config for a given token

setSale(uint256,(uint64,uint64,uint64,ui.notice: As we want everyone to be able to create a token and sale we wont be using function, but leaving this here as its convention within ZoraCreator

userdoc.notice: A sales strategy for ZoraCreator that enables perpetual editions
